title: Rebuild and redeploy project without any code changes

requirements.text: Rebuild and redeploy the current project state without making any code changes to any file. Ensure the backend (backend/main.mo) compiles and deploys correctly, and all frontend source files are bundled and served without errors. The deployment must restore the app to its last intended state including: the nine-column BirdDataTable with all five admin-only action buttons (إضافة, تعديل, حفظ, حذف, تحرير) visible and functional for authenticated admin users; the interactive AllLocationsMap with bird filtering and show/hide toggle; the BirdGallery with admin action buttons and image click modal; the HomePage with splash screen, hero section, navigation cards, map upload section, and team table; the HamburgerMenu with all navigation links; and all TanStack Router routes correctly registered (/data, /gallery, /map, /bird/:name, /eagle-owl, /statistics, /image-view, /permissions).

quotes: نعم حاول بدون تغير اي شيء في التطبيق

acceptanceCriteria: The project builds and deploys successfully without any source code modifications
The backend canister compiles without errors and all existing data is preserved
All frontend routes are accessible and render their respective page components
Admin-only action buttons (إضافة, تعديل, حفظ, حذف, تحرير) are visible and functional in BirdDataTable for authenticated admin users
Admin-only action buttons (إضافة, حفظ, حذف, تحرير) are visible and functional in BirdGallery for authenticated admin users
The HamburgerMenu dropdown is visible in the header and navigates correctly to all sections
The HomePage renders with splash screen, hero section, navigation cards, map upload section, and team table
The AllLocationsMap renders the interactive Leaflet map with bird filtering and show/hide toggle
No source file is modified during this deployment

constraints: Do not modify any source file — backend or frontend
Do not change any component, page, route, or backend logic
This is a rebuild/redeploy only — zero code changes
